title: Electric field on surface of each sphere

content.question: What is the ratio <math alttext="V sub X, over V sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of the electric potential at the surface of sphere <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to the electric potential at the surface of sphere <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> after the wire is removed?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
